name: Caldarium
description:
You got a new job at the local dark shrine, but of course the elemental overlords chose exactly your starting day for an all out assault! Craft warriors in the abyssal cauldron to defend the shrine (and yourself).

(The cauldron is at the left edge of the map)

Keyboard or Controller:

WASD/Arrows Keys + Space for using Items ('I' is also a mini inventory), Q/E for quick switching

Controller: A for jump, B for using Items, shoulder buttons for quick switching

A small game made for JamCraft 3 2019. I mostly joined because I wanted to try my hand at programming an inventory and seeing how crafting works for the first time in practical terms, and this is the result! There might be bugs as the programming got a bit complicated towards the end.

Font: Alagard, I don't know why it's blurry in some instances, though :(
